name: Pollinator
description:
An 80s style dodging game made for a school project. Controls are simple, use the [Up] and [Down] keys to move the bee, use [Space] when prompted, and [Escape] returns you to the title screen.

Can you get to the end? Or can you find the secret, more difficult levels?

This game may not be of the highest quality, but it's just a time waster.

Notice: Unfortunately, I was unable to input a pause function, so take your time on screens where you're not playing the game, if necessary (Title and Instruction Screens, or Cutscenes)

Also, if you don't want to listen to an 8 second loop of 8-bit Flight of the Bumblebee, feel free to mute it.
